programme.title: Hard Boiled
programme.desc: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

programme.title: Samurai Reincarnation
programme.desc: The villain is called Amakusa Shiro Tokaisada. He is actually based on a real christian samurai. The movie was one of the inspirations for the game called 'Samurai Shodown' (actual spelling)

programme.title: Crime Story [Dubbed]
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in one of his grittiest roles ever as a police detective on the edge, who must race against time to solve a deadly kidnapping case. Based on the shocking true story of a billionaire abducted in a bold ambush, and filled with explosive martial-arts battles, Crime Story pulses with tension and excitement. Director Kirk Wong (The Big Hit) deftly combines acrobatic fight choreography with edge-of-your-seat action for this thrilling and dramatic tour-de-force for Jackie Chan.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: With vicious drug cartel assassins on their heels, a hardened border town rancher (Liam Neeson) helps a young boy escape to safety across America.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: Alvin and Lance, his girlfriend’s brother, leave the city behind to spend the summer of 1988 repainting traffic lines on a desolate country highway, bickering and joking their way into an unlikely friendship.

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame To Kill For
programme.desc: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

programme.title: The Kill Room
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.desc: With vicious drug cartel assassins on their heels, a hardened border town rancher (Liam Neeson) helps a young boy escape to safety across America.
